meta.title: Eric | Director, BitAngels Arizona
meta.description: Meet Eric, the BitAngels leader cultivating Arizona’s blockchain founders and investors through collaborative pitch ecosystems.

hero.name: Eric
hero.title: Director, BitAngels Arizona
hero.tagline: Launching breakthroughs by connecting Arizona’s top blockchain builders with capital and community.

about.summary: Eric convenes developers, financiers, and founders to turn Arizona into a catalyst for the next generation of digital asset innovation.

origin_story.headline: Building an ecosystem, not just events.
origin_story.copy: With years of experience growing Arizona’s startup community, Eric recognized the need for a disciplined investor network and partnered with BitAngels to launch one.

inflection_point.headline: From problems to breakthroughs.
inflection_point.copy: By curating founders who focus on political, legal, and regulatory excellence, Eric helped shift local discourse from hype to durable breakthroughs.

mission.headline: Cultivate a collaborative Arizona hub where blockchain founders thrive with the right capital and guidance.

pillars.title: Breakthrough Mindset
pillars.description: Encourage founders to create futures worth living in, not just incremental fixes.

pillars.title: Collaborative Competition
pillars.description: Foster a pitch environment where elite teams push each other while sharing insights.

pillars.title: Ecosystem Support
pillars.description: Connect developers, financiers, and partners so solutions compound beyond any single project.

project.name: BitAngels Arizona
project.problem: Arizona’s fast-growing blockchain sector needed structured capital connections and disciplined evaluation criteria.
project.solution: BitAngels Arizona brings together mission-driven founders and investors through curated pitch competitions, mentorship, and partnership with the global BitAngels network.
value_proposition: Showcase the region’s strongest blockchain builders to an active investor audience.
Lean on political, legal, and regulatory expertise to de-risk ambitious ventures.
Tap into a global community of 55,000+ members for capital, mentorship, and deal flow.

experience.headline: Welcome to BitAngels Arizona, where collaboration fuels the next wave of Web3 success.
copy: Pitch events spotlight founders tackling real-world infrastructure, compliance, and municipal-scale challenges.
Investors and partners gain insider access to projects shaping the future of digital assets in the Western Hemisphere.
Every gathering reinforces a community-first ethos—press play, press fund, and build the future together.

features: Workshops on regulatory compliance and GAAP standards

traction.community_growth: 55,000+ members across Arizona tapping into BitAngels resources and deal flow.
traction.breakthrough_founders: Highlighted ventures like collateralized debt platforms enabling municipalities to keep the lights on.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to help shape Arizona’s blockchain future?

highlights: Eric curates one of the stiffest blockchain pitch competitions in the region, emphasizing compliance and sustainability.
Connects talented developers, financiers, and founders to build a thriving Arizona ecosystem.
Champions collaborative competition, where teams push each other toward a better future.
Believes the community is on the cusp of breakthroughs that will redefine digital asset innovation.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: We’ve been looking at these problems for quite a while, and I think we’re at that catalyst where things are going to pop.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: It’s really exciting to be creating a future instead of trying to solve just problems.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: We’ve had a group of talented developers, financiers, and BitAngels tries to connect companies, founders with capital.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: I just see amazing talent and a future worth living inside of.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: Competition is really a good thing because this is a collaborative effort.

timeline.event: Eric organizes Arizona blockchain meetups and identifies demand for structured investor access.
Launches the BitAngels Arizona chapter to connect founders, financiers, and developers.
Hosts showcases featuring ventures like collateralized municipal infrastructure platforms.
Community reaches 55,000+ members aligned around collaborative breakthroughs.
